Articles.Content: Hello, and could anybody tell me if there is a mod that uses stock textures for 45* RCS thrusters? I really need those for some ships but the ones from Ven's Stock Revamp are not stock enough.
Check RLA stockalike. I don't know if they 'reuse' textures, but they're pretty much exactly what you are looking for.
I have seen then, but the black diamond puts me off, I dont like it on there. Maybe I can ask him how to remove it. Thank you though!

Aside from that, the only other 45 degree RCS I know is from HGR. They're not exactly like the stock though, they've a flat design. The diamonds I figured were there to tell them apart from the .... 90 degree, I guess we'll say. Good luck!
If you can use an image editor, it should be easy to remove the diamond.

On 14/12/2015, 06:03:59, legoclone09 said:

I have seen then, but the black diamond puts me off, I dont like it on there. Maybe I can ask him how to remove it. Thank you though!


Here you go! Just drag and drop right into your KSP install and overwrite anything it asks. The only things in the download are replacement .mu files for the two 45* blocks with slightly altered UV mapping that uses a different part of the same texture. Let me know if anything is wrong with it but it looked okay in my quick testing. @komodo you're right as well, the diamonds are to help differentiate the 45* from the regular blocks.
